value.ai_summary:
Here's a comprehensive technical summary for the WebSpark.Bootswatch repository:

WebSpark.Bootswatch is a sophisticated .NET Razor Class Library designed to seamlessly integrate Bootswatch themes into ASP.NET Core applications, providing a robust and flexible theming solution built on Bootstrap 5. The library offers advanced features like dynamic theme switching, light/dark mode support, and comprehensive caching mechanisms, targeting multiple .NET framework versions (8.0, 9.0, and 10.0) to ensure broad compatibility and future-proofing. Architecturally, it leverages dependency injection, tag helpers, and a custom StyleCache service to enable easy theme management with high-performance retrieval and minimal configuration overhead. The project distinguishes itself through its multi-framework support, intelligent theme detection, and a meticulously designed extension method approach that simplifies theme integration with just a few lines of configuration code. Primarily targeting .NET developers building web applications who require professional, responsive UI theming with minimal setup complexity, WebSpark.Bootswatch provides a production-ready solution for dynamic, customizable design systems that can be quickly implemented across different project types.
